metadata.title: CVE-2015-1803 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The bdfReadCharacters function in bitmap/bdfread.c in X.Org libXfont before1.4.9 and 1.5.x before 1.5.1 does not properly handle character bitmaps itcannot read, which allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and crash) and possibly execute arbitrarycode via a crafted BDF font file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxfont1 - 1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxfont package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.2').
